content:
Hello Graham,

Over the past couple of weeks, I have been creating sample files and then posting them to http://fhir2.healthintersections.com.au/open/Composition, and was able to successfully post., and receiving the below errors.

Could you please let me know if the server is down.

Could not get any response
This seems to be like an error connecting to http://fhir2.healthintersections.com.au/open/Composition.
Why this might have happened:
The server couldn't send a response:
Ensure that the backend is working properly
SSL connections are being blocked:
Fix this by importing SSL certificates in Chrome
Cookies not being sent:
Use the Postman Interceptor extension
Request timeout:
Change request timeout in Settings > General

Hello Graham,

Over the past couple of weeks, I have been creating sample files and then posting them to http://fhir2.healthintersections.com.au/open/Composition, and was able to successfully post. However for the past 2 days, I am receiving the below errors.

Could you please let me know if the server is down.

Could not get any response
This seems to be like an error connecting to http://fhir2.healthintersections.com.au/open/Composition.
Why this might have happened:
The server couldn't send a response:
Ensure that the backend is working properly
SSL connections are being blocked:
Fix this by importing SSL certificates in Chrome
Cookies not being sent:
Use the Postman Interceptor extension
Request timeout:
Change request timeout in Settings > General
I don't know, I'll try and look later today
My server is down, and I can't rescue it until I get home from camping over Easter. Sorry.
I'm sure it deserves a holiday too . . .
I wasn't able to reach it today
